reviewText: The idea of a twin stick shooter combined with tower defense got me excited but this is a clear mobile port and it shows.  The gameplay is overly simple and it gets old very fast.  At least it runs well and has decent graphics.
voteText: 11 of 15 people (73%) found this review helpful 2 people found this review funny

reviewText: An enjoyable shooter that offers a decent amount of content. The visuals are crisp and colourful and the soundtrack is great; it fits the action perfectly.  It's fun bunching up a load of robots around one of the explosive barrels and taking them all out with a well-timed shot. I can imagine the game would get a bit repetitive after extended play; best enjoyed in short bursts. Worth a try.
